solution_line_template: Both apple trees will be {apple_tree_width} feet wide at maturity so they will be {num_apple_trees}*{apple_tree_width} = <<{apple_tree_width}*{num_apple_trees}={total_apple_width}>>{total_apple_width} feet wide
Quinton will need to leave {space_between_apple_trees} feet between these 2 trees so the apple trees will take up {total_apple_width}+{space_between_apple_trees} = {total_apple_space} feet

Both peach trees will be {peach_tree_width} feet wide at maturity so they will be {num_peach_trees}*{peach_tree_width} = <<{peach_tree_width}*{num_peach_trees}={total_peach_width}>>{total_peach_width} feet wide
Quinton will need to leave {space_between_peach_trees} feet between these 2 trees so the peach trees will take up {total_peach_width}+{space_between_peach_trees} = {total_peach_space} feet

Together, the apple trees will take up {total_apple_space} feet and the peach trees will take up {total_peach_space} feet so they will take {total_apple_space}+{total_peach_space} = <<{total_apple_space}+{total_peach_space}={total_space}>>{total_space} feet
